name: World Collider Defender
description:
Stop meteors from destroying the very realistic world!

Paddles save the day!

move the big paddle around the world with A and D

move the small paddle around the world with left and right arrow keys - REALISTIC 2 PLAYER ACTION! TELL A FRIEND!

Note: If you do end up losing, feel free to click "Try Again?", it will restart the game for you :) Yay game jams!

Part of Ludum Dare 38, "A Small World":

World Collider Defender
